DeepVeer Pre-Wedding Rituals Are In Full Swing As Ranveer Singh Shines Bright At His Haldi Ceremony
The wedding festivities have begun for Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh. The couple who is head over heels in love with each other are gearing up to begin their new happy phase of life together, and of course, they are on cloud nine.
While we were all prepping up for Diwali, a few days ago designer Sabyasachi gave us a glimpse inside bride-to-be Deepika Padukone’s wedding rituals at her Bangalore home. She beamed with happiness at the Nandi Pooja.
And today, Ranveer Singh was spotted at his house amid his Haldi ceremony reportedly. According to the reports, today Ranveer Singh celebrated Haldi ceremony at his home. He was happily smiling while casting director Shanoo Sharma from Yash Raj Films took selfies with him. Take a look at the pictures below.
